section.section: On or before November 20, 1996, and on or before December 1 each fourth year thereafter, the Commission shall issue a report containing recommendations to the Board of County Commissioners for review and consideration.
This paragraph does not apply to the salaries of the County Commissioners or the Sheriff.
Within 45 days after receiving the recommendations of the Commission, the Board of County Commissioners shall set by local law the salary for each office included in the recommendations:
Subject to paragraph (3) of this subsection; and
With respect to a public official, in accordance with Article III, § 35 of the Maryland Constitution.
The Board of County Commissioners may accept, reduce, or reject but may not increase the recommendations of the Commission.

On or before December 15, 1996, and on or before December 15 each fourth year thereafter, the Board of County Commissioners shall submit recommendations to the legislative delegation concerning the salaries of the County Commissioners and the Sheriff.
